game.name: Taboo Trial
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: In the rogue action game "Taboo Trial", you will play as a young female warrior from the Norse mythology, who can transform into multiple cute and sexy female warriors. In the visually stunning 3D world, you will use your combat skills to uncover the truth behind the Twilight of the Gods.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In the rogue action game "Taboo Trial", you will play as a young female warrior from the Norse mythology, who can transform into multiple cute and sexy female warriors. In the visually stunning 3D world, you will use your combat skills to uncover the truth behind the Twilight of the Gods.

reviewHighlights.text: 처음에 주는 세트룬이 너무 좋음 난이도 올라가면 잠깐 맞아도 즉사인데 원거리 공격 찾아서 마법룬으로 바꾸면 딜이 진짜 10배이상 차이남 심지어 딜 나오기까지 예열도 너무 걸림. 룬에 달려있는 옵션중 2가지중 하나 택해서 스테이지 클리어할떄마다 딜 올리는 방식인데 마법룬...
